column2:
"A Dark Falz that creates copies of opponents it's eaten...
Dark Falz [Double]."
"The most troublesome thing left to the last minute."

"They have already consumed both [Apprentice]'s and [Loser]'s Power.
It's probable that they've already
consumed [Elder]'s power as well."
"I wonder if they're still appearing in Harkotan."

"Since they're treating it as a playground,
we want to end them there if possible."

"But first, we must consult this with Harkotan's Miko.
Can both of you sortie right away?"

"Alright, leave it to us.
My physical examination's over and I'm ready to go!
I can do anything!"

"If you're alright that's fine.
Just concerned about you."

"The battle from ten years ago are starting to
overlap with the events of this battle."
